JMRTD 0.4.4
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.jmrtd

Interface Summary
AuthListener Interface for authentication event observers.
ImageReadUpdateListener Interface for image update observers.
PassportListener Interface for passport insertion and removal observers.
 

Class Summary
AAEvent Event to indicate AA protocol was executed.
BACEvent Event to indicate BAC protocol was executed.
ChipAuthenticationInfo A specialised SecurityInfo structure that stores chip authentication info, see EAC 1.11 specification.
ChipAuthenticationPublicKeyInfo A specialised SecurityInfo structure that stores chip authentication public key info, see EAC 1.11 specification.
COMFile File structure for the EF_COM file.
CSCAStore  
CVCAFile  
DataGroup Super class for data group files.
DG11File File structure for the EF_DG11 file.
DG12File File structure for the EF_DG12 file.
DG14File Data Group 14 stores a set of SecurityInfos for Extended Access Control, see EAC 1.11 spec.
DG15File File structure for the EF_DG15 file.
DG1File File structure for the EF_DG1 file.
DG2File File structure for the EF_DG2 file.
DG3File File structure for the EF_DG3 file.
DG4File File structure for the EF_DG4 file.
DG5File File structure for the EF_DG5 file.
DG6File File structure for the EF_DG6 file.
DG7File File structure for the EF_DG7 file.
EACEvent Event to indicate EAC protocol was executed.
FaceInfo Data structure for storing face information as found in DG2.
MRZInfo Data structure for storing the MRZ information as found in DG1.
Passport A passport object is basically a collection of buffered input streams for the data groups, combined with some status information (progress).
PassportApduService Low level card service for sending apdus to the passport.
PassportCertificateGenerator  
PassportEvent Event for passport insertion and removal.
PassportFile Super class for passport files (EF_COM, EF_SOD, and data groups).
PassportManager Manages passport insertion and removal events.
PassportPersoService Service for initializing blank passport reference applets.
PassportService Card service for reading files (such as data groups) and using the BAC and AA protocols on the passport.
SecureMessagingWrapper Secure messaging wrapper for apdus.
SecurityInfo The general implementation of the SecurityInfo structure.
SODFile File structure for the EF_SOD file.
TerminalAuthenticationInfo A specialised SecurityInfo structure that stores terminal authentication info, see EAC 1.11 specification.
TerminalCVCertificateDirectory Stores terminal CV certificate and keys.
Util Deprecated. The visibility of this class will be changed to package.
 

Enum Summary
FaceInfo.Expression Expression code based on Section 5.5.7 of ISO 19794-5.
FaceInfo.EyeColor Eye color code based on Section 5.5.4 of ISO 19794-5.
FaceInfo.FaceImageType Face image type code based on Section 5.7.1 of ISO 19794-5.
FaceInfo.Features Feature flags meaning based on Section 5.5.6 of ISO 19794-5.
FaceInfo.HairColor Hair color code based on Section 5.5.5 of ISO 19794-5.
FaceInfo.ImageColorSpace Color space code based on Section 5.7.4 of ISO 19794-5.
FaceInfo.ImageData Image data type code based on Section 5.7.2 of ISO 19794-5.
FaceInfo.SourceType Source type based on Section 5.7.6 of ISO 19794-5.
